title: GulfTalent Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from GulfTalent. You can provide either a search URL or keywords/location.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: A GulfTalent search URL to start scraping from. If provided, this will override the Keyword and Location fields.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Search term(s) for jobs (used if Start URL is not provided).

location.title: Location
location.description: Optional location filter (used if Start URL is not provided).

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, the scraper also opens each job detail page to capture the full description (slower, but richer data).

maxJobs.title: Max jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available.

maxPages.title: Max pages
maxPages.description: Safety cap on how many listing pages to visit. Leave empty for no cap (the actor still stops at Max jobs).

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw Cookie header string (e.g., "pref_exp=; OptanonConsent=...").

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (recommended). Consider Residential if you encounter blocks.
